subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: The freshman Victor Anderson ran for 176 yards and 3 touchdowns and Louisville raced by visiting Kansas State, 38-29. Anderson scored on runs of 29, 56, and 27 yards as the Cardinals (2-1) overpowered the visiting Wildcats (2-1), rolling up 578 yards of total offense, including 303 on the ground.
